long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Reward yourself with a beautiful nature wallpaper each time you open a new tab.

This extension replaces your Chrome “new tab” page. When installed it will show you gorgeous landscape image every time you open a new tab.

Features:

* Tens of hand-picked high quality images
* Randomly selected full-page background for each new tab
* Links to most visited, bookmarks, history and more (you can choose which one to show/hide)
* Minimalist and clutter-free interface — just the wallpaper and the small menu on top (if you decide to keep it) and nothing more
* Works offline (no internet required)
